name: Sir Fallen
description:
The Story so far

After the long journey home your dog has returned to you, but you have been "asleep", when you wake your dog is gone. This time it is your turn for adventure. Climb Treacherous Titan Tower to reunite with your best friend. Collect hidden collectables along the way. Be careful or you might fall back to the ground. Slippery Slopes will stop you from moving and spikes will send you back to the last flag. Can you make it to the top? Can you make it to the top on Hard Mode? Good luck!

Features

  • Punishingly Difficult Platforming
  • Easy to learn but difficult to master mechanics
  • Collectables
  • Steam Leaderboards
  • Achievements
  • Loss of progress
  • The Feeling of Rage and Frustration

What is not in the game

  • Easy Mode
  • Calmness
  • Tranquillity
